messages.title: SPECIAL REPORT
messages.content: NHS for sale with the Conservatives?

messages.title: Don't let greedy bankers get away with it again

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Nick Clegg’s fair deal for children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Extra one to one tuition for children who need it most. Abolish university tuition fees for all students.
An extra £80 million to help improve discipline and raise standards for struggling pupils.
Fairer taxes that will put cash back in your pocket.

issues.economy: Few things have caused more anger than the sight of bankers getting bonuses again.
issues.education: A fair start for children across Britain like those in the picture under Labour.
issues.health: Your NHS is on the election battleground with fears it might go up for sale if the Conservatives are allowed to take power.

politicalExperience.achievements: Sandra helped save Romsey Hospital, helped bring a popular addition to the thriving local economy.

quotes.text: Lib Dem Shadow Chancellor Vince Cable: 'It’s time to break up the big banks'
